TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FillMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何填滿關閉路徑的內部。

span.span: Specifies how the interior of a closed path is filled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式會填滿內部的路徑，使用兩種填滿模式之一： 替代或捲繞。An application fills the interior of a path using one of two fill modes: alternate or winding. 模式會決定如何填滿和裁剪的封閉圖形內部。The mode determines how to fill and clip the interior of a closed figure. 預設模式是替代。The default mode is Alternate. 若要判斷內部的封閉圖形中的替代模式，顯然是在路徑外的某個時間點從路徑中的任何任意開始點繪製一條線。To determine the interiors of closed figures in the alternate mode, draw a line from any arbitrary start point in the path to some point obviously outside the path. 如果行超出奇數數目的路徑區段，起始點是在關閉的區域，因此填滿效果或裁剪區域的一部分。If the line crosses an odd number of path segments, the starting point is inside the closed region and is therefore part of the fill or clipping area. 偶數數目的交叉表示的點不會填滿或裁剪區域中。An even number of crossings means that the point is not in an area to be filled or clipped. 開放圖形是填滿，或使用列來將最後一個點連線到第一個點圖裁剪。An open figure is filled or clipped by using a line to connect the last point to the first point of the figure. 捲曲模式會考慮每個交集處之路徑區段的方向。The Winding mode considers the direction of the path segments at each intersection. 它將加入另一個用於每個順時針旋轉的交集，並減去另一個用於每個逆時針算起的交集。It adds one for every clockwise intersection, and subtracts one for every counterclockwise intersection. 如果結果為非零值，就會點視為填滿效果或裁剪區域內。If the result is nonzero, the point is considered inside the fill or clip area. 零計數表示的點落在填滿效果或裁剪區域外。A zero count means that the point lies outside the fill or clip area. 圖是視為順時針方向，或以逆時針方向根據在其中繪製的圖線段的順序。A figure is considered clockwise or counterclockwise based on the order in which the segments of the figure are drawn. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個開放的圖表 （弧線） 和一個封閉的圖形 （橢圓形） 的路徑。The following example creates a path that has one open figure (an arc) and one closed figure (an ellipse). FillPath 方法填滿的路徑，根據預設的填滿模式，也就是 Alternate.The 下圖顯示的範例程式碼的輸出。The FillPath method fills the path according to the default fill mode, which is Alternate.The following illustration shows the output of the example code. 請注意，路徑會填滿 （根據替代） 一樣開放的圖表已關閉一條直線透過其結束點至它的起點。Note that the path is filled (according to Alternate) as if the open figure were closed by a straight line from its ending point to its starting point. ![填入開啟路徑](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "填入開啟路徑")![Fill Open Path](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "Fill Open Path") 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/CS/Class1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

related.span: 操作說明： 填滿開放圖形

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Alternate = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Winding = int32(1)
